name: The Unbound Force
description:
Unleash the forces within the Heart of Azeroth, causing shards of Azerite to strike your target for 238 Fire damage over 2 sec. This damage is increased by 300% if it critically strikes.

Each time The Unbound Force causes a critical strike, it immediately strikes the target with an additional Azerite shard, up to a maximum of 5.
